mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_sns ( site, sns_id, email, cdate, mdate ) VALUE ( #{site}, #{snsId}, #{email}, now(), now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE email = #{email}, mdate = now()
INSERT INTO user ( uid, password, email, role, lockedYn, dormantYn, cdate, mdate ) VALUE ( #{uid}, #{passwd}, #{email}, 'ROLE_USER', 'N', 'N', now(), now() )
INSERT INTO user_sns_rel ( uid, site, sns_id, cdate, mdate ) VALUE ( #{uid}, #{site}, #{snsId}, now(), now() )
